title: Generics
description: Writing type-safe, reusable code that works with any data type using type parameters. Generic classes like `List<T>` and `Dictionary<TKey,TValue>` avoid boxing and provide compile-time type checking. Use constraints (`where T : class`) to restrict type parameters and enable specific operations.
shortDescription: Type-safe reusable code with `List<T>`, `Dictionary<TKey,TValue>`, and constraints.
